snippet: Facing defeats as three other states held their nominating contests on Tuesday, Newt Gingrich traveled to a place he hopes will help get him back in the saddle next month: Ohio.
abstract: Newt Gingrich, dealt big defeats in the Minnesota and Colorado caucuses, is campaigning in Ohio, where he feels he can win; strong showing in state would help him claw back from disappointing showings in Florida and Nevada and play into his strategy of trying to regain momentum in conservative Southern states and working-class backgrounds.
lead_paragraph: Facing defeats as three other states held their nominating contests on Tuesday, Newt Gingrich traveled to a place he hopes will help get him back in the saddle next month: Ohio.

headline.seo: Gingrich Turns to Ohio, Hoping for a Super Tuesday Payoff
headline.main: Gingrich Focuses on Ohio, Hoping for Eventual Payoff on Super Tuesday
headline.print_headline: Gingrich Focuses on Ohio, Hoping for Eventual Payoff on Super Tuesday
